name: Crown Weatherproof Full-Zip Sherpa Fleece - Kids

features: Regular fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy
Dryride Mist-Defy DWR bonded fleece repels water while staying soft, stretchy, and comfortable, PFC-free DWR
Mapped with sherpa fleece on the main body and hood
Attached hood, Interior storm flap features fabric behind the zipper to keep out the wind
Stretch binding at cuffs and hem and stretch thumb loops, Unisex sizing
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during Manufacturing
